text.div:
SHR SettingVS ValueSet

What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

name: SHR SettingVS ValueSet
title: SHR SettingVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

concept.display: At or during work, in a workplace setting.
At home
In a residential setting
A primary or secondary school
In a parked or moving vehicle
An non-manufacturing, indoor business setting
A manufacturing-oriented business setting
A place of business
A setting where food is served
A place where food is prepared
Workplace that is primarily outdoors
A setting where manufacturing takes place
A building or residence that is owned
A building or residence that is rented
Shared (unassisted) living residence, such as a dormitory or fraternity
Foster care group home
Assisted living or independent living facility
Skilled nursing facility or other Long-Term Care
Homeless or other type of shelter
Hotel or motel
Permanent supportive housing for formerly homeless persons (such as SHP, S+C, or SRO Mod Rehab)
Psychiatric hospital or other psychiatric facility
Substance abuse treatment facility or detox center
Individual resides in a correctional facility, state hospital, jail, prison, youth authority facility, juvenile hall, boot camp or Boys Ranch.
Transitional housing, residential provier program, or any type of halfway house
A homeless camp, abandoned building, shantytown, bus/train/subway station/airport, or squatter area
Outside of any shelter, e.g., on a street
Agricultural setting
A farm with livestock
On a battlefield
Deployed to a military camp or area
On a boat
On an airplane
Aboard a submarine
